history.proof: intros a b H. unfold not. intros contra. sauto q: on dep: on depth: 3.

original: intros a b H. unfold not. intros contra. apply contra. clear contra. destruct H. destruct (Z.div_mod_full a b H). rewrite H0 in H. clear H0. destruct H1. destruct (Z.pos_div_eucl 1 x). rewrite Z_div_mod_POS with (b:=b) (a:=x). destruct a0. unfold snd. apply H. rewrite H0. exists z. auto. + apply Z.pow_pos_nonneg. apply H1. apply H2. + apply (Z.pow_nonzero b x). destruct a0. apply H3. apply H. apply H2. + rewrite Z.Z_mod_rem_0_iff. apply H1. apply H2.
